code: import React from"react";import"../../style/LandingPage/LandingPageBlock.css";import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function RowBlock(_ref){let{playerName,infoName,image,rowInfo}=_ref;const[blockPictureColor,setBlockPictureColor]=useState("transparent");useEffect(()=>{if(rowInfo==="draftLotteryOdds"){let draftLotteryOddsColor=infoName.split("(");draftLotteryOddsColor=draftLotteryOddsColor[1].split(")");const trend=draftLotteryOddsColor[0];if(trend==="UP"){setBlockPictureColor("lightgreen");}else if(trend==="DOWN"){setBlockPictureColor("#ff6666");}else{setBlockPictureColor("#ff9900");}}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"generic-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"block-picture",style:{backgroundColor:blockPictureColor},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"block-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"block-info-name",children:playerName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"block-info-info",children:infoName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clear-div"})]});}
